      public static RouteFinder load​(java.lang.String filename)
      Load serialized RouteFinder
      参数:

      返回:

    • save

      public void save​(java.lang.String filename)
      Serialize this RouteFinder object and save it as a filename
      参数:
      filename - the path of the file

    • step

      public boolean step() throws NoRouteFoundException
      Move a step in the maze. The strategy for solving the maze is Depth First Search (DFS) All reachable tiles is virtually transformed into a tree structure by "findUnvisited" and traversed with DFS strategy.
      返回:
      whether the maze has been solved
      抛出:
      NoRouteFoundException - will raise an exception if the exit is not reachable from the entrance

    • isVisited

      public boolean isVisited​(Tile t)
      Check if the given tile has been visited before
      参数:
      t - , the tile to check
      返回:
      whether the tile has been visited

    • isRoute

      public boolean isRoute​(Tile t)
      Check if the tile is a part of the route
      参数:
      t - , the tile to check
      返回:
      whether the tile is a part of the route
